title.narrative: BCCI Develop piggery business together with Landbank and Agriterra.

description.narrative:
BCCI is a multi purpose cooperative with its main activity in the loans and credit business. As part of their diversification strategy BCCI invested in a piggery where piglets are produced and fattened until ripe for slaughtering. Next to this they have decided to vertically integrate the business. as of now they are mixing their own feeds and operate a meat shop in the proximity of the farm.

The main objective is to increase pork production and scale up the amount of meat shops.

at the moment they produce 3000 heads/ year and their meat shop has a net sales of PHP 2.363.848 26 in 2019. The objective is to execute a market study feasibility study and if the former turns out positive a business plan for the expansion of BCCI activities.

The costs of this project will be covered by BCCI. We agreed with them on a EUR 10.000 success fee that will be paid to Agriterra Philippines if the project proves to be successfull. 

There are no specific targets related to gender equality environmental sustainability and or current financial management practices. There is no need from the cooperative to have Agriterra to focus on this.

Create insight in possibility of increased pig production. Assist to improve the sales performance of the meat shop.

We are intending to achieve this through the following agripool assignments:

Develop a market study design with the help of Agripool.

Conduct a feasibility study on the basis of the marketing study results.

Develop a business plan in case the feasibility study leads to a positive recommendation.

In January 2019 Agriterra signed an MoU with Landbank foundation (LCDFI) to assist cooperatives that are a client of Landbank. These cooperatives will hire Agriterra for Agripool services. Agriterra will charge these cooperatives with a lump sum of USD 10.000 -

Under this project with LCDFI We have agreed with BCCI to assist them with three agripool assignments. the focus of these assignments will be on expanding the current piggery business as well as improving on the meat shop performance.

The first agripool assignment took place allready in November 2019. Two agripoolers from the Rabobank assisted to develop a market study design. 

2nd agripool assignment will focus on drawing conclusions from the market study as well as execution of a feasibility study for the proposed business expansion.

3rd agripool assignment will be the development of a business plan.
